data.title: Film Studio Research
data.meta_description: Film Studio Research - Download as a PDF or view online for free
data.text:
1. By Kaylee Fowler FILM STUDIO RESEARCH

2. Founded: 1999 Founders: Robert Zeneckis , Joel Silver, Gilbert Adler. Parent Organization: Silver pictures. Most successful films: Orphan (2009), House Of Wax (2005) , Thirteen Ghosts (2001) , House on Haunted Hill(1999). Dark Castle Entertainment is an American film production label, it is a division of Silver Pictures, a production house formally afflicted with warner bros but is now afflicted with universal studios. Dark Castle Entertainment name pays homage to William Castle a horror film maker from the 1950s and the 1960s. When first formed the goal was to re make Castles films. After two remakes, it moved on to producing original material , along with remakes of non Castle films. They also began to produce films not just from the horror genre but thriller also. DARK CASTLE ENTERTAINMENT

3. Founder: Jason Blum Date Founded: 2000 Films: Paranormal Activity film franchise , Insidious franchise , Ouija(2014), The Purge (2013), The Purge Anarchy (2014), Whiplash (2014) , The Lazarus Affect (2015). Blumhouse Productions is an American movie production company , mostly know for producing horror and thriller movies. Blumhouse produces micro- and low-budget horror movies, such as the Paranormal Activity, Insidious, The Purge, and Sinister franchises. BLUMHOUSE PRODUCTIONS

4. Founders: James Carreras , William Hinds Founded: November 5th 1934 Headquarters: London CEO: Simon Oakes Films: Dracula (1958), The Curse Of Frankenstein (1957), The Vampire Lovers (1970), Dracula Prince Of Darkness, The Brides Of Dracula (1950). Hammer Film Productions is a British film company based in London. Founded in 1934 the company is best known for a series of gothic HAMMER FILM PRODUCTIONS
